channel.title: EasyRSC Connection Problem
channel.description: So, other people can connect to server when im hosting off my computer, but when i host off a friends, get the unable to connect error. Don't need to port forward for mine since my internet doesn't user a router but for my friends I do. So I've port forwarded 43594(tcp/upd), any others ports im supposed to open?

item.title: EasyRSC Connection Problem
item.dc:creator: @russian_b russian b
item.description:
@russian_b wrote:

Problem solved, thx to Kryptix for going on teamviewer and helping me.

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC Connection Problem
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

maybe u forgot to put ur friends ip in the server and client file where u put urs when u ran it on ur pc

Read full topic
